run.description: Start the development server and open a preview

FileUpload.description: The FileUpload component must validate file size
FileUpload.rule: Empty files (0 bytes) must be caught and handled before processing

rules: Never automatically commit changes to Git unless explicitly requested
By default, only propose changes using propose_code
Let the USER review and implement the changes
Let the USER make their own commits with their preferred commit messages and timing
EXCEPTION: If the USER explicitly asks to commit with phrases like 'Commit now', then DO perform the commit
